column4: It's a matter of definition, really. To me, a "daemon" is a "very long-lived program".
and how u know after boot ? ;)
every processes run the same time long
The concept of a "service" is not the same as in windows.
i know that .. i tried to show u .. its not true every time ;)
mrak> Arafangion: and how u know after boot ? ;)
Everything is started after boot, by definition. ;)
Heh, it's "it", not "a", as you are not referring to any general item, but a particular concept, and it's "good", not "very well", because your english doesn't get sick. :)
I've yet to *successfully* learn a second language, so what can I say? :(
